alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 5:18AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...THE CHUGACH NATIONAL FOREST AVALANCHE CENTER HAS ISSUED A SPECIAL AVALANCHE BULLETIN... SPECIAL AVALANCHE BULLETIN BROADCAST REQUESTED 6:00am Sunday, March 26, 2023 The Chugach NF Avalanche Information Center in Girdwood has issued a SPECIAL AVALANCHE BULLETIN for the following areas: Girdwood, Portage, Turnagain Pass, Moose Pass, Summit Lake, and Seward * WHAT...Dangerous avalanche conditions exist in the backcountry. Avalanche danger is CONSIDERABLE. * WHERE...For Turnagain Pass and the Kenai and Western Chugach Mountains in and around Eastern Turnagain Arm. * WHEN...In effect from Sunday 6:00am to Sunday 8:00pm AKST. * IMPACTS...Very large human-triggered avalanches are likely. Despite clear skies and nicer weather, the snowpack is very unstable and dangerous avalanches can be easily triggered by people. It is likely avalanches may be triggered remotely from flat terrain below steeper slopes. * PRECAUTIONARY / PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If deciding to recreate in the backcountry, choose terrain that is flat or less than 30 degrees in steepness, with nothing steeper above you. Cautious route-finding and conservative decision-making skills will be necessary to identify and avoid slopes that could avalanche. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
